page.title: 10ROWSLEY FESTIVAL
page.content: ROWSLEY FESTIVAL Each year we have a festival .The festival includes sports,well dressings,a concert ,bike races, discos,barn dancing,flower festivals, maypole dancing,football,dog show, and a lot of other things.The well dresings is done by some grown ups and some children.The flower festival takes place in the church a group of ladies get together and make Rowsley church smell nice and look nice.Each year the flower festival has a theme to it.Maypole dancing is done each year by 1st years 2nd years 3rd years and 4th years.The dances we perform are the Rowsley dance,spiders web,single plat and gipses tent.We also have two country dances.
